title: Contribute to the Tezos Core Protocol
description: The full source code of Tezos is available on gitlab.com/tezos. Tezos is written in OCaml, an industrial-strength programming language supporting functional, imperative and object-oriented styles [1]. OCaml is a functional programming language that offers speed, unambiguous syntax and semantics, and formal proofs of correctness.

frontMatter.title: Contribute to the Tezos Core Protocol
